title: Test2 React Component Architecture
content:
# Test 2 React Component Architecture

## Overview
This guide covers best practices for structuring React components in large applications.

## Component Types
- Presentational Components
- Container Components
- Higher-Order Components
- Hooks

## File Structure
```
src/
  components/
    common/
    features/
  hooks/
  utils/
```
description: A comprehensive guide to React component architecture and best practices
